name: Cubchoo
description: The Chill Pokémon. Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Hail damage. It's AC is increased by 2 in arctic conditions, or when it is snowing or hailing.

abilities.name: Slush Rush
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Hail damage, and its speed is doubled in arctic conditions, or during a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a damaging Dark, Bug, or Ghost move, it makes its next attack at advantage.
